content: Hello Mister Schmidt, my name is Emilia Müller from Germany. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in Magdeburg. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Emilia Müller from Germany

content: Hello Emilia, nice to meet you. Let's start with a high price to see how much you are willing to pay. The apartment is in the city center and has a lot of potential. I think 1500 euros per month would be a good starting point.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: While the location is attractive, I must consider my budget carefully. After thoroughly evaluating my financial situation, I find myself unable to accept a price of 1500 Euros per month. I am open to exploring a more moderate rental price.
name: Emilia Müller from Germany

content: Understood, Emilia. Let's try something in the middle then. How about 1000 euros per month? This is a great apartment in the city center, and I am sure you would be happy living here.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content:
Considering the attractive features of the apartment and its prime location, I find the offer at 1000 Euros per month more reasonable compared to the earlier proposal. If we can come to an agreement on this price, I would be delighted to rent the apartment. I agree to the price of 1000 Euro!

TERMINATE
name: Emilia Müller from Germany
